RelatedSentence: The weekly Gadget Digest is a free e-mail newsletter alerting you to new articles .

Tigo Tanzania has entered a partnership with Facebook in which all its customers in the country will get free access to Facebook services in English and a new Kiswahili version through their mobile handsets .

Tigo Tanzania has entered a partnership with Facebook in which all its customers in the country will get free access to Facebook services in English and a new Kiswahili version through their mobile handsets .

Nicola D Elia , Facebook Director for International Growth and Partnerships commented We 're excited to be working with Tigo again to give more people in Tanzania the ability to share and connect free of data charges across Facebook apps and mobile website , and now in the traditional language of Kiswahili .
